MCQ: Which ancient civilization flourished in the basins of the Indus River, covering an area of 1.25 million km2?
Choice: A:Mesopotamian Civilization | B:Indus Valley Civilization | C:Egyptian Civilization | D:Chinese Civilization

MCQ: Who founded the Mughal Empire in South Asia?
Which dynasty ruled parts of present-day Afghanistan, Pakistan, and northwestern India during or slightly before the 1st century CE?
Choice: A:Ghurid dynasty | B:Samma dynasty | C:Ghaznavid dynasty | D:Kushan Empire

MCQ: The Soanian archaeological culture of the Lower Paleolithic is named after which valley near modern-day Islamabad?
Choice: A:Sutlej Valley | B:Khyber Pass | C:Sivalik Hills | D:Gandhara Valley

MCQ: Which empire expanded out of what is now Afghanistan into the northwest of the subcontinent under the leadership of their first emperor, Kujula Kadphises?
Choice: A:Mughal Empire | B:Maratha Empire | C:Kushan Empire | D:Delhi Sultanate
